title: [Traditional Erotic Fairy Tales] Gojgam X Tiger
alternative_title: [전래야한동화] 곷ㅜ감이 나타났다! ; [Traditional Erotic Fairy Tales] The Tiger Who's Like Persimmon ; [Traditional Erotic Fairy Tales] The Sense of Closeness Has Appeared!
status: [전래야한동화] 곷ㅜ감이 나타났다! ; [Traditional Erotic Fairy Tales] The Tiger Who's Like Persimmon ; [Traditional Erotic Fairy Tales] The Sense of Closeness Has Appeared!
description:
Description :
        A bumbling, timid tiger overhears humans talking and mistakenly believes that dried persimmons (Gojgam) are terrifying monsters. One fateful night, he encounters a thief in the dark and, in his confusion, faints, thinking the thief is a dreaded Gojgam. Seizing the opportunity, the cunning thief, aware of the immense value of this rare tiger-human hybrid, dreams of striking it rich by selling him as an elite 'tiger bodyguard'!
